1222:918: tasya dharmaḥ sarvāśāparipūraṇatayā sarvaparapravādimṛgabhīṣaṇatayā ca siṃhanāda ityucyate|
1222:922: tayā bhagavataḥ prajñā gantavyā pāragamanāt pāramitā veditavyetyarthaḥ|
1222:926: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karma saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe||8-34||
1222:939: bhagavāṃstānvigrahānnirmimīte ye nārakāṇāṃ narakāgninirvāpaṇena dharmadeśanayā ca tathā tiraścāṃ svamāṃsarudhirādidānena tathā pretānāmannapānādidānena dharmadeśanayā ca cittamabhipra sādya tena cābhiprasādena svagatibhyaścyutānāṃ devamanuṣyeṣūpapādayanti|
1222:940: devānapi hīnayānādhimuktikān dharmadeśanayābhiprasādya manuṣyeṣūpapannān yāvacchrāvakabodhau pratyekabodhau ca pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyantīti gatipraśamanakarma||
1222:941: ye ca manuṣyān bāhyādhyātmikeṣvāmiṣadāneṣu laukikalokotareṣu ca dharmadāneṣu,
1222:947: yathā hi māyākāro vicitrāṇi vastūni yāvabhdakṣyabhojyāni nirmāya lokaṃ toṣayati|
1222:948: sa ca loko na jānāti sarvametadadravyakamiti|
1222:949: yaśca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na sa dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ kiñcitpaśyati na sattvaṃ nāpi sattvaprajñaptiṃ dharmāṇāmapi nairātmyāditi sattvārthayāthātmyaniveśanakarma||
1222:950: sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃśca dāne niyojayati dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate|
1222:951: ye cānye dānaṃ dadati teṣā ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ|
1222:952: evamātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣatītyādi vācyamiti ṣaṭpāramitāniveśanakarma||
1222:953: ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate|
1222:954: ātmanā ca pañcaśikṣāpadāni yāvadātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayatīti vācyamiti buddhamārganiveśanakarma||
1222:955: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pāramitādīn sarvadharmān deśayati|
1222:956: teṣāṃ koṭitrayasya phalasya ca prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ deśayati|
1222:958: tataste bhūyasyā mātrayā prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimadhigacchantīti prakṛtiśūnyatāniveśanakarma||
1222:959: prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ na cānyā prakṛtiśūnyatā anye dharmāḥ|
1222:963: yatpunarabhisambudhya dharmā deśitāḥ skandhadhātvādayo vā yāvatsarvākārajñatā vā tatsarvaṃ lokavyavahāreṇeti sāṅketikajñānaniveśanakarma||
1222:964: yadi pāramitādiṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate tathāpi samyaksambodhaye na śaknoti|
1222:965: yadi punasteṣveva carati teṣāṃ ca koṭitrayaṃ phalaṃ ca nopalabhate|
1222:967: yadyapi bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvaṃ sattvaprajñaptiṃ ca nopalabhate tathāpi saṃvṛtyā paśyati sattvān vastūpalambhena saṃkliṣyamānān|
1222:968: sa tāṃstatprahāṇāya triṣu yāneṣu paripācayatīti sattvaparipākaniveśanakarma||
1222:974: na ca teṣu tatphaleṣu vā gantavyamiti sarvābhiniveśaprahāṇaniveśanakarma||
1222:976: yato bodhi eva mārgaḥ mārga eva bodhiḥ|
1222:977: bodhisattva eva tarhi buddhaḥ syāditi cet|
1222:978: yadā sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya vajropamasamādhau sthitvā bodhisattva ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā samyaksambodhimadhigacchati tadā sa eva tathāgataḥ sarvadarśī sarvajña iti nirdiśyata iti bodhiprāptiniveśanakarma||
1222:979: sa ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca daśākuśalasaṃgṛhītāni dauḥśīlyāni ṣaṭpāramitāvipakṣāṃśca hīnayānaphalānāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sākṣātkriyāspṛhayoravakāśaṃ,
1222:980: skandhadhātvādisāśravānāśravasarvadharmasaṃjñādauṣṭhulyāni ca nivārya svayaṃ ca pāramitādiṣu sarvakuśaladharmeṣu pratiṣṭhito bhavati parānapi pratiṣṭhāpayati|
1222:981: tacca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇakṛtvā ātmanaḥ samyaksambodhau ca sarvākārāyāṃ ca svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhau pariṇāmayati|
1222:982: praṇidhānāni ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye yathā sūtraṃ karotīti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiniveśanakarma||
1222:983: prathamacittotpādika eva bodhisattvaḥ samyaksambodhau niyato bhavati|
1222:985: yaḥ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caturṣu vāpramāṇeṣu carati daśa cākuśalān dharmān prahāya tiṣṭhati|
1222:986: aṣṭau tasyākṣaṇā na sambhavanti kiṃ punarapāyopapattiḥ|
1222:990: tadyathā tathāgataḥ paramavaśitvalābhātsarvalokadhātuṣu yugapadanantānātmabhāvān parārthāya nirmimīta iti samyaksambodhiniyataniveśanakarma||
1222:991: sa hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu sattvānāmartha karoti na ca lipyate|
1222:995: trīnimāndharmānasau nopalabhate śūnyatāyāṃ ca sthitaḥ sarvaśukladharmeṣu sthito bhavati|
1222:1000: ye te daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo ye ca teṣu tathāgatāḥ sarve te svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kevalaṃ nāmasaṅketena prajñapyate|
1222:1002: yadi tu kasyacicchūnyatā na syāt prādeśikī syāt|
1222:1003: yatastu na pradeśikī tataḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyā iti|
1222:1004: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ṣaḍabhijñā abhinirharati|
1222:1005: yāsu sthitvā daśadiksarvatathāgatānupasaṃkrāmati paryupāste tebhyaśca dharma śṛṇoti teṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayatyanabhiniviṣṭaḥ|
1222:1007: sa divyena cakṣuṣā daśadiglokadhātuṣu sattvān dṛṣṭvā sadyo'bhijñayā tatra gatvā tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati|
1222:1008: divyena śrotradhātunā daśadiksarvabuddhānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvodgṛhya sattvebhyo deśayati|
1222:1009: cetaḥparyāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cittāni viditvā yathācittamebhyo dharma deśayati|
1222:1013: sa tābhirabhijñābhiryaṃ yamevākāṃkṣatyātmabhāvaṃ sattvānāmarthāya pratigrahītuṃ taṃ tameva pratigṛṇhāti|
1222:1014: na ca tatra sukhaduḥkhānunayapratighairūpalipyata iti daśadigbuddhopāsanādiniveśanakarma||
1222:1017: yadi teṣu carati koṭitrayaṃ ca teṣāṃ nopalabhate|
1222:1018: yadi cātmanaḥ samyaksambodhaye sarvasattvānāṃ cāgratāyai tān samyakpariṇāmayati|
1222:1019: yadyamī bodhisattvadharmāḥ katame tarhi buddhadharmāḥ ? eta eva|
1222:1025: na hi sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānanti|
1222:1026: ajānantaḥ pudgalaṃ dharmāṃśca kalpayantaḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vā|
1222:1029: kecitpunaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ parijñāya sugatidurgatīḥ prahāya nirvāṇamadhigacchanti|
1222:1030: bodhisattvāḥ pāramitādīn kuśalān dharmānparipūrayantaḥ krameṇa daśabhūmīnadhigamyaikakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñāyā sarvadharmānabhisambudhya buddhā bhagavanto bhavantīti karmaphalasambandhāvipraṇāśananiveśanakarma||
1222:1033: yā teṣāṃ samatā tathatā niḥsvabhāvatā sā na kaściddharmamupalabhate satyaparyāpannamanyaṃ vā|
1222:1034: tataḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyanniyāyamamavakramya gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati dhyānānyutpādayatyapramāṇānyārūpyasamāpattīśca|
1222:1035: sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā duḥkhaṃ parijānāti samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati|
1222:1041: yadi bhagavannabhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā kathaṃ bodhisattvena rūpādau śikṣitavyaṃ yāvadbuddhadharmeṣu ?
1222:1049: idaṃ rūpamiyaṃ vedanā yāvadamī buddhadharmā iti bhāvaḥ||
1222:1063: na tasyotpādanirodhau tato na sa svabhāvaḥ||
1222:1065: kiṃ punarbhagavan sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena na santyeva rūpādayo yāvadbuddhadharmāḥ ?
1222:1071: sacetsaskāranimittaṃ vastu sa evānabhilāpyo dhāturiti vyāhatametat||
1222:1082: yadyasau saṃskāranimittādanyaḥ syādapīdānī sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ parinirvāyuḥ samyaksambodhi cābhisambudhyeran|
1222:1085: anabhilāpyadhātūpanibaddhe prajñāpracāre vartamāne yadi saṃskāranimittaṃ nopalabhyate tatkimasannopalabhyate sadvā ?
1222:1087: yadi vikalpato grahaṇameti na vikalpeṣvapagateṣu tadā parikalpamātraṃ taditi na tasya sattvamasattvaṃ vā|
1222:1091: yaduta parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ dharmatā rūpam|
1222:1095: tatra yā saṃskāranimitte vastuni rūpamiti nāmasaṅketavyavahāraṃ niśritya rūpasvabhāvatayā parikalpanā tatparikalpitaṃ rūpam|
1222:1097: yā punastena parikalpitena rūpeṇa tasya vikalpitarūpasya nityakālaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā nairātmyaṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭistaddharmatārūpam|
1222:1106: advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yaduta rūpamiti yāvadbuddhadharmā iti tatkatham ?
1222:1116: evamantadvayaṃ prahāya madhyamāpratipadaṃ pratipannasya rūpe yāvadbuddhadharmeṣu kathaṃ lakṣaṇaparijñā lakṣaṇaprahāṇa lakṣaṇasākṣātkriyā lakṣaṇabhāvanā ca ?
1222:1118: rūpasya yanna parijñānaṃ nāparijñānaṃ tadevāsya parijñānam|
1222:1119: evaṃ yāvadyā bhāvanā nābhāvanā saiva bhāvanā|
1222:1124: gambhīrameṣāṃ nirvāṇaṃ yato na tannirvāṇaṃ nānirvāṇam|
1222:1125: tatkatham ? yataḥ parānārabhya saṃsārāparityāga eṣāṃ na nirvāṇam|
1222:1130: sa tarhi saṃsarati nirvāti ceti na yuktam ?
1222:1132: yā śūnyatā yā cānupalambhapratiṣṭhānatā so'sya nirvāṇāparityāgaḥ||
1222:1142: kinnu bhagavan sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇāmekāntena nirvāṇapratiṣṭhā bhavati ?
1222:1145: asti sā gotrajātiryā ādita eva praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate|
1222:1156: tasya tatprāptaye yā upapattayo na tāḥ karmakleśavaśena|
1222:1157: api tvacintyāṃ nirvāṇapāragāminīmarhato'pyupapattiṃ prajñapayāmi yā prathamā gotrajātiḥ sā bodhisattvānām||
1222:1161: yadamī śakratvalokapālatvacakravartitvādibhiḥ sarvalokasampattibhiranarthino'nuttarāyāṃ bodhau kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayanti|
1222:1165: ktisukhamanavagrahasukhaṃ nirvṛtisukhaṃ ca tatsarva sarvasattvasādhāraṇamicchanto'nuttarāyāṃ bodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayanti saṃsārāparityāgatayā|
1222:1174: dharmāṇāmabhāvasvabhāvamajānantaḥ sattvā viparyāsasamutthitairvikalpaiḥ karmāṇi kṛtvā yathākarmaphalāni prāpnuvanti|
1222:1181: tataḥ saṃkliśyante ca lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthataḥ|
1222:1182: na hi kiñcidvastvasti vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātrakamapi yatra sthitvā karma kuryuḥ|
1222:1185: tacca lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahriyate na paramārthato'nabhilāpyatvāditi vyavadānaniveśanakarma||
1222:1186: yadyapi svapnamāyopamāḥ sarvadharmā nirvastukāstathāpi tadajānantaḥ sattvā vastvabhiniveśena karmāṇi kṛtvā sugatidurgati gacchanti|
1222:1187: atasteṣāṃ viparyāsaprahāṇāya bodhisattvo bodhau cittamutpādya saṃsāre carati|
1222:1190: na dvayenābhisamayo nādvayena ! eṣa evātrābhisamayo yatra na dvayaṃ nādvayam||
1222:1204: yaśca saṃskṛto dhāturyaścāsaṃskṛta ubhāvetau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau na rūpiṇau anidarśanāvapratighāvekalakṣaṇau yadutālakṣaṇau“ iti saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāvyatibhedena jñānaniveśanakarma||
1222:1207: te na śrāvakairna pratyekabuddhairna tathāgataiḥ kṛtāḥ|
1222:1208: yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā tannirvāṇaṃ“ iti nirvāṇaniveśanakarma||
1222:1213: “nyāyo hi sācāro dharmaḥ svabhāvaśca dharmākhyaḥ“ iti vacanāt|
1222:1216: daśadiksarvalokadhātusthiteṣu sarvasattveṣu sarvairākāraiḥ yathā bhājanamavicchedena yāvadākāśaṃ pravṛttiḥ|
1222:1217: tayā tajjanikayā bhagavataḥ prajñāpāramitāyā akopyatā tādṛśyeva veditavyā|
1222:1219: samudrāparyantatāvākyādibhirakopyatāvākyaparyantaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyā ye viśeṣā uktāsteṣāṃ pāramārthikaṃ jñānamānupūrvyā darśayitukāmaḥ pṛcchati tatkasya hetoriti|
1222:1226: tathā hi ye ca rūpādayo yā ca teṣāṃ śūnyatā yā ca prajñāpāramitā sarva ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo'nidarśanā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇā iti bhāvaḥ|
1222:1241: yāni punaḥ sthānāni cintayan bālaḥ śaktikṣayāt khinna unmādyet mūrcchet maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet tāni sthānānyacintyāni teṣu tulayiṣyati|
1222:1242: yathaitāni bhagavatā paramayogīśvareṇa dṛṣṭāni tathaiva nirdiṣṭāni|
1222:1253: ahamiti mameti rūpamiti vedanetyevamādikaḥ sarvābhiniveśaḥ sarvamanyanā|
1222:1255: sarvaparapravādibhirmārādibhiḥ kleśaiśca yāḥ kampanāḥ tāḥ sarveñjanāḥ|
1222:1266: sarvākārajñatā mārgajñatā sarvajñatā ceti trayametallakṣaṇaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ|
1222:1296: āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyā ekonatriṃśattamaḥ parivartaḥ||
